guide.introduction: If you have an old computer speakers, you can turn them into speakers for phone or MP4.
guide.introduction_rendered:
If you have an old computer speakers, you can turn them into speakers for phone or MP4.

Relevant parts
  • Battery, 9V
Tools
  • glue gun,soldering iron,rotary tool,screwdriver

lines.text: Cut the wire that goes from the transformer to the circuit board and connect it to the batteries (9V battery).
lines.text_raw: Cut the wire that goes from the transformer to the circuit board and connect it to the batteries (9V battery).

lines.text: You can insert new speakers if you want. I will add this little high-def.
lines.text_raw: You can insert new speakers if you want. I will add this little high-def.

lines.text: Cut the holes for new speakers or add another box with speakers.
lines.text_raw: Cut the holes for new speakers or add another box with speakers.

lines.text: Glue the battery box to the back of speaker box. Watch my speakers test.
lines.text_raw: Glue the battery box to the back of speaker box. Watch [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tpPNFBhVmns|my speakers test].
